definition: bamboo writing slips in ancient times (joined together to form whole scrolls)
simple/uncomplicated/letter/to choose/to select/bamboo strips used for writing (old)

sentences.english: It can also be done on bamboo scrolls.
sentences.chinese: 它也可以在竹简上进行。

sentences.english: People write words on bamboo slips in ancient times.
sentences.chinese: 古代人们把文字写在竹简上。

sentences.english: It is reported that these pieces of bamboo with Chinese characters were found in Hunan.
sentences.chinese: 据说，这些带有中国文字的竹简是在湖南发现的。

sentences.english: Fong Ma Tianshui, Gansu Beach on the 1st Qin tomb, unearthed bamboo slips 460.
sentences.chinese: 甘肃天水放马滩一号秦墓，出土竹简460枚。

sentences.english: The Art of War by Sun Tzu was composed on a bamboo slip in the 6th century.
sentences.chinese: 孙子于6世纪将《孙子兵法》编写在竹简上。

sentences.english: The fundamental viewpoints in the bamboo' s letters Shi lun are mostly accepted by Mao shi xu.
sentences.chinese: 竹简《诗论》的基本观点大多为《毛诗序》所继承。

sentences.english: Therefore, we temporarily assigned to this group of bamboo along the Western Han Dynasty Jian Du discussed.
sentences.chinese: 因此，我们暂将这批竹简划归西汉简牍一并论述。

sentences.english: Before paper was invented, slips of bamboo were the most important writing medium.
sentences.chinese: 在发明纸张以前，竹简是最常用的书写介质。

sentences.english: For very many years they wrote on pieces of bamboo.
sentences.chinese: 多年来，他们写在竹简上。

sentences.english: The missing parts of the inscribed bamboo slips have not yet been discovered.
sentences.chinese: 迄今仍未发现竹简残缺的部分。

sentences.english: The excavated wooden tablets and bamboo slips are of great historical value.
sentences.chinese: 出土的木牍竹简极有历史价值。

definition: booklet/brochure/(old) book (made of bamboo strips tied together)
